About Ops Platform :

At its core, OpsPlatform bridges the gap between the “offline world” and “online Gojek”. The products we build enables us to :
- Handle all of the incoming customer, driver, merchants and service partners queries; automated resolution of queries using rule engine, ML/AI, chatbots; We also have In-App Help SDKs (Android, iOS, Web) that enables speedy resolution of customer queries.
- Automated onboarding for drivers, merchants; end-to-end kyc using OCR, ML/AI models, face-biometrics, 3rd party validations/verifications, user segmentation, fraud detection and blacklisting.
- Inventory and orders of branded merchandize for drivers and service partners; tools to organize and coordinate community initiatives.
- AdTech for 2W and 4W vehicles, measure reachability and impact of the Ads.


Gojek is an equal opportunity workplace that is committed to diversity and inclusion. At Gojek we celebrate our differences, because we believe that diversity not only creates a healthier work environment for our employees, but also helps our business thrive. 



About us

Gojek is a technology startup based in Jakarta, Indonesia. Specialising in ride-hailing and logistics, we are also the only company in Southeast Asia to be part of Fortune's 50 Companies That Changed the World (2017).

Gojek is a Super App: one app with over 20 services including food delivery, commuting, digital payments, shopping, hyper-local delivery, massages, and many more.

Gojek is Indonesia’s first and fastest growing unicorn building an on-demand empire. Our total of 2,000,000 driver-partners collectively travel 16.5 million KM daily – making us Indonesia’s de-facto transportation choice.

Gojek is a verb! Gojek is a way of life!
lever.description:
About the team:

We are looking for passionate Engineering Manager who will be leading many sub-teams and work closely with CARE Group Product Manager and deliver cutting edge product.
Operations Platform (aka "OpsPlatform") builds services and products for Gojek’s Customers, Drivers, Merchants, and Service Partner operations. CARE group in Ops Platform enables our users to speedily resolve their queries. This is enabled by host of Products developed by CARE:

1. In-App Help Center SDK (Android, iOS, Web) - Help Center is CARE’s flagship product. This product is versatile and is embedded in many of Gojek’s mobile applications that includes Gojek app, GoDriver app, GoBiz (Merchant) app. Help Center enables the end-user to browse and search in the knowledge base, and find a resolution for their queries. If the resolution is not sufficient, the user is able to escalate the issue via automated ticketing mechanism or by calling Customer service. App also collects feedback from end users so that the knowledge base is constantly updated.

2. Rule Engine for Automated Resolution - For many of our customer queries, we enable automated resolution using our powerful and configurable rules engine.

3. ML based Query Prioritization Engine - We use ML models both to prioritize the highest urgency tickets, as well as find an automated resolution mechanism derived from constantly updated Machine Learning model.

4. In-App Inbox - In-App Inbox keeps our end-user updated with the status of their queries.

5. Chatbots - For speedy resolution of our end-users query, we are currently working on enabling the query <> resolution mechanism using guided chatbots.

6. Customer Profiling Store - Our customer profiling store helps us understand our customers even better, and personalize our approach to their preference.

7. Central Information Store - Our CARE units responding to customer queries are helped by this powerful store which enables them to pull the details of customers, transactions, and other details in fraction of a second.

lists.content:
• As Engineering Manager on CARE, you will be leading all the sub-teams and reporting to Head of Engineering for Ops Platform.
  • Work closely with CARE Group Product Manager, partner in planning, execution and timely delivery of the commitments.
  • Accountable for the Technology and Architecture decisions.
  • Preparing and executing Technology roadmap for Product initiatives.
  • Accountable for ensuring scalability, and uptime on services managed by the group.
  • Preparing and executing Technology initiatives taken by Engineering Org on your group.
  • Communicate technology and business strategies effectively with all the teams in the group.
  • Mentoring, coaching and implementing support system for people to achieve their highest potential.

• 8+ yrs of experience in Technology, with last 4+ yrs in a leadership role at Team or Group level
  • Experienced with one of the Agile Iterative Software Development Process, e.g. XP, Scrum, Kanban
  • Hands-on with technology, contributes ~50% of the time through direct coding
  • Strong communicator, and able to effectively communicate with cross-functional, distributed and diverse team members
  • Tech visionary and up-to-date with technology trends to incorporate them in the roadmap and have an operational edge in business
  • Technology Leader, and able to understand and execute technology initiatives by proper planning and implementation
  • Excellent organisational skills to coordinate complex and multi-team initiatives
  • Excellent time management skills to prioritize and focus on value delivering initiatives

    • Technology Stack on Ops Platform :
  • Programming Languages: Golang, Ruby on Rails, Java/Kotlin, Clojure, Scala, Python
  • XP: Test Driven Development, Pair programming, CI/CD
  • Services: JSON-REST and GRPC
  • Deployments: GKE, Kubernetes, Docker, Google Cloud, AWS
  • Product Management Tools: JIRA, Confluence
